website_summaries.verdict: Bold matte color that won't smudge or wear off.
pros: Lightweight, long-wear formula has a deep, matte finish
Customers described the colors as "intense" because of the lip stain formula that makes the lips look fuller
Uses avocado and vitamin E to keep lips hydrated

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct color listed on the item within Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the item is incorrect. I planned on receiving a beautiful pinkish red color and ended up with nude purple. Not pleased at all and this item cannot be returned. Wasted money. The picture needs to changed to the ACTUAL color that will be sent.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Possible fake
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I had this color previously and loved it. My local Ulta does not have it in stock. Unfortunately this product arrived without the original packaging and with a gross sticker wrapped around the actual tube of lipstick leaving it all sticky. 99% sure this is a fake. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: amy b.

customer_reviews.title: Stinks, but works
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff but I'm not a fan of the chemical smell. Makes me realize what impurities I'm putting in my body for the sake of beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Correct color, same packaging and product that I have purchased at ulta only it was much cheaper on here.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Beiler

customer_reviews.title: Full size!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite color of this brand of lipstick. I honestly thought I was getting a mini, but it is FULL SIZE. My dad was made.
customer_reviews.author: Gingebinge

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped it was
customer_reviews.text: Okay I was nervous to order this due to the reviews. I received this product as a sample via Ipsy and fell in love. This item came in original packaging and was the right color. I wore it today for the first time and it lasted from 7am this morning till about 3 with no reapplication. I was completely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Morgan N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on this color. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: two face Queen B Matte Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: love this lipstick, shade and stays on great .. will be buying different shades
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, goes on smooth, and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, smooth formula
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and feel. Not as drying as some of the other matte liquids I’ve tried. However it does transfer more easily.
customer_reviews.author: SusieGfunk

customer_reviews.title: No safety seal no original packaging
customer_reviews.text: It did not come in original packaging absolutely no seal for safety I DO NOT recommend. Mine is in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Queen B is right
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect nude lipstick! Stays on all day. Nice purple undertone so it doesn’t clash with skin types I love this stuff 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It last at least 6 hrs during my work day, I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holbert

customer_reviews.title: Stays on
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it stays on and doesn’t smudge or come off if you wipe your lips, kiss someone they don’t end up with lips on their face
customer_reviews.author: Carol Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Deceiving description of item! They show it being full sized when it's actually travel sized & color is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting - rich color
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color and it lasts much better than other lipsticks I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: DS1867

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come in its box as adverticed nor was the bottle sealed, which rly makes me doubt the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: It is not a long wearing lipstick at all . It gone after 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona I.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick was not the color it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Starling

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This is not really my favorite color...which is no fault of the product, just my personal preference. It goes on nice and feels nice on, too...not sticky which I like. I don't necessarily think it lasts an overly long time...but truth be told I've never found a lipstick that truly does. With a better color, I think I'd be happy
customer_reviews.author: SavedByGrace

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had read the bad reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This is a mauve & not at all what I was expecting. It's an awesome lipstick, but order only if this is the color you want.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nude color
customer_reviews.text: Great lipstick Matte stays on for hours also good nude color !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Queen B is hands down my favorite shade! Natural with a bit of a pop :)
customer_reviews.author: gizmo2006

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick! It feels great on my lips without drying them out. It lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: andyballetmom

product_meta.title: Too Faced Melted Matte Liquified Matte Long Wear Lipstick - Queen B - Full Size
product_meta.description: What it is: A lightweight, long-wearing liquified matte lipstick with a creamy and matte, color-rich formula. What it does: Matte color gets a makeover. Too Faced’s innovative formula glides onto lips like a gloss but dries to an ultra-matte, opaque finish. Melted Matte ensures that your lip color always looks rich, full, and kissable—and is never dry, shriveled, or cracked. The doe-foot applicator comfortably coats lips in bursts of intense, vivid matte color that lasts for hours. It’s infused with Volulip for a no-sting plumping and smoothing effect and antioxidant-rich avocado oil and vitamin E to moisturize, while hyaluronic filling spheres smooth the look of lip lines. It comfortably coats lips with a wash of intense, high-impact, super-saturated color that lasts for hours.
feature_bullets: A lightweight, long-wearing liquified matte lipstick with a creamy matte, color-rich formula.
Formulated to glide onto lips like a gloss but dries to an ultra-matte, opaque finish.
Infused with Volulip for a no-sting plumping and smoothing effect. Antioxidant-rich avocado oil and vitamin E to moisturize, while hyaluronic filling spheres smooth the look of lip lines.
Doe-foot applicator coats lips in bursts of intense, vivid matte color that lasts for hours.
Color - Queen B - (Soft Mauve - Matte Finish) - Full Size - New in Retail Box
